Files Headings

_baseInverter.js

 
var baseForOwn = require('./_baseForOwn');

The base implementation of _.invert and _.invertBy which inverts object with values transformed by iteratee and set by setter.

Params
object Object The object to iterate over.
setter Function The function to set accumulator values.
iteratee Function The iteratee to transform values.
accumulator Object The initial inverted object. 
function baseInverter(object, setter, iteratee, accumulator) {
  baseForOwn(object, function(value, key, object) {
    setter(accumulator, iteratee(value), key, object);
  });
  return accumulator;
}

module.exports = baseInverter;
